member_organisations:
Membership of Euromcontact is two fold: Global companies being direct members and national associations.  
All details can be found here: www.euromcontact.eu/members
fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, Research and innovation, Public Health
eu_initiatives: Euromcontact is currently following the discussions on the Commission proposed Regulation on Medical Devices. Contact Lens and lens care products are medical devices and any changes from the current regulatory Framework needs to be communicated to the members of the association. In addition, the European industry has for a long time called for the inclusion of aestethic contact lens in the scope of the regulation, to guarantee a high consumers' safety- as aestethis and corrective lenses have the same characteristics and risk profile.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Working Group on Clinical Investigation and Evaluation #E01576#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=1576#Member#C#Working Group on European Databank on Medical Devices#E01309#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=1309#Member#C#Medical Devices Experts Group#E01574#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=1574#Member#C#Classification and Borderline Expert Group#E01306#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=1306#Member#C
membership: Euromcontact is a member of the ad hoc Platform European Coalition for vision, a Platform comprising industry, health NGOs, academics and research, whose goal is to leverage the issue of vision health to the EU public health Policy agenda.
relevant_communication:
Euromcontact tries to organise face-to-face meetings with Commission officials, Représentatives of member states and MEP rapporteur on the file of Medical Devices.  
Euromcontact has not organised and does not plan to organise in the future any event.  
All publications (position papers) of Euromcontact are available on the website of the organisation: www.euromcontact.eu
